message.name: ERR_ALLOCATION_TARGET_ITEM_RELATED_ID_ZERO
message.locale: An identifier must be specified for the target item.

message.name: ERR_ALLOCATION_TARGET_ITEM_RELATED_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A user name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_ALLOCATION_TARGET_ITEM_XRV_ASSIGNED_ALREADY
message.locale: This allocation target item has already been added to this allocation target.

message.name: ERR_UNKNOWN_USER_TARGET_ITEM
message.locale: User '%1s' is a target item of allocation target '%2s' but cannot be found on the system.
